cset1.name: MSYS-Chat-1M
cset1.description: 1 million real-world conversations with 25 LLMs, collected from 210K unique IPs.

cset2.name: CoQA
cset2.description: 127K conversational question-answer pairs across 8K dialogues from 7 domains.

cset3.name: The Gutenberg Dialogue Dataset
cset3.description: 14.8M English dialogues extracted from public-domain books.

cset4.name: Pchatbot
cset4.description: Large-scale dataset with anonymized user IDs and timestamps for personalized chatbots.

cset5.name: Bitext Customer Support Dataset
cset5.description: 26,872 QA pairs across 27 intents and 10 categories for customer service chatbots.
